title: [Large-Scale] Understanding Multicultural Society and Nationalism: Social Science Inquiry Through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational social science concepts (e.g., culture, identity, community)
context.additional_context: Science-integrated project-based learning with an inquiry-driven approach through real-world case studies

learning_goals: Students can analyze the scientific background of multicultural phenomena and explain the process of ethnic identity formation.
Learners can visualize the correlation between multicultural acceptance and nationalism based on data collected in blended learning environments.
Participants can propose strategies for fostering balanced civic consciousness through project outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
